title: [Large-Scale] Lifelong Learning Accessibility Reform and Corporate Training Policy Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of corporate education policies and lifelong learning systems
context.additional_context: Blended Learning Environment Combining Online Learning Modules and Face-to-Face Workshops Using Digital Devices. Emphasizes Capabilities to Analyze Corporate Training Policies for Improving Lifelong Learning Accessibility in the Mathematics Domain

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the impact of corporate training policies on employees' learning motivation
Learners can evaluate competency-friendly environments within organizations to improve lifelong learning accessibility
Learners can derive policy improvement plans utilizing mathematical thinking in blended learning environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
